item.title: Leif add a quote by Christopher Hitchens
item.description: "That which can be asserted without evidence, can be dismissed without evidence." -- Christopher Hitchens

item.title: Leif add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "If you can't win by reason, go for volume." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Leif add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "The nuclear arms race is like two sworn enemies standing waist deep in gasoline, one with three matches, the other with five." -- Carl Sagan

item.title: Leif add a quote by Sam Harris
item.description: "We know enough at this moment to say that the God of Abraham is not only unworthy of the immensity of creation; he is unworthy even of man." -- Sam Harris

item.title: Leif add a quote by Sam Harris
item.description: "Theology is ignorance with wings." -- Sam Harris

item.title: Leif add a quote by Thomas Paine
item.description: "To argue with a man who has renounced the use and authority of reason, and whose philosophy consists in holding humanity in contempt, is like administering medicine to the dead, or endeavoring to convert an atheist by scripture." -- Thomas Paine

item.title: Leif add a quote by Jon Stewart
item.description: "Yes, the long war on Christianity. I pray that one day we may live in an America where Christians can worship freely! In broad daylight! Openly wearing the symbols of their religion... perhaps around their necks? And maybe -- dare I dream it? -- maybe one day there can be an openly Christian President. Or, perhaps, 43 of them. Consecutively." -- Jon Stewart

item.title: Leif add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "I cannot believe in a God who wants to be praised all the time." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Leif add a quote by Sam Harris
item.description: "The president of the United States has claimed, on more than one occasion, to be in dialogue with God. If he said that he was talking to God through his hairdryer, this would precipitate a national emergency. I fail to see how the addition of a hairdryer makes the claim more ridiculous or offensive." -- Sam Harris

item.title: Leif add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "Stupidity is the same as evil if you judge by the results." -- Margaret Atwood
